wikipedia_page.main: Paul Warren (born 28 October 1974) is a British actor known for roles in the science fiction, fantasy and horror genres, often wearing heavy prosthetic makeup and/or creature suits.  He is probably most known for playing 'Varmik' a hassk thug in Star Wars: The Force Awakens, but has also appeared in such films as Star Wars: The Last Jedi, Guardians of the Galaxy, Thor: The Dark World, Clash of the Titans, World War Z and Ghost Stories
